key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: How often the extension checks for active SSH sessions.

key.name: show-icon
key.description: Whether to display the SSH Watchdog icon in the panel.

key.name: show-prefix
key.description: Whether to display the SSH text prefix before the session count.

key.name: show-notifications
key.description: Whether to show a notification when new SSH sessions are detected.

key.name: show-disconnect-notifications
key.description: Whether to show a notification when SSH sessions close.
